author: SeeminglyScience
body:
I'm looking to include a few classes from this repo (mainly around AST type inference) in a project.  The files have been modified, mostly to replace internal API calls.

Should I include the copyright headers on the modified files?  Or would a third party notices file be sufficient?

comments.author: SteveL-MSFT
comments.body: @SeeminglyScience let me get back to you on this

comments.author: SeeminglyScience
comments.body: @SteveL-MSFT Any updates on this? I know it's not a quick question to answer, just making sure it doesn't fall through the cracks.

comments.author: SteveL-MSFT
comments.body: @SeeminglyScience the recommendation is to attribute in a top level ThirdPartyNotices.txt file

title: Including modified PowerShell source files in another project
